txt.en: 'Well done, friend! I think you did better than you did on your first attempt at the trial!\n\n'You've now completed stage one, but there are six more to go if you want to complete the trial again!'
'Go on and drink! You're lagging behind! You'll never complete the trial on time if you're talking to me!'
Drink six beers within the allotted amount of time.
Drink five more beers within the allotted amount of time.
'Oh dear, you look a bit flushed. Are you feeling ill?'
Drink four more beers within the allotted amount of time.
'This is quite disturbing to watch, let me assure you!'
Drink three more beers within the allotted amount of time.
'You're almost done! Don't bother breathing, just finish it!'
Drink two more beers within the allotted amount of time.
Drink one more beer within the allotted amount of time.
Full and queasy with drink, you should now speak to the Inn League member in front of you.

As a member of the Inn League you are allowed to periodically test your mettle by once more completing the initiation trial.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends. </rgb>

'Hullo! As a member of the Inn League, you no longer need to worry about running the initiation trial again, but if you are looking to test your mettle once more, I won't stop you!

'Now remember, the goal is to drink six of the beers there on the table. Strong ones or weak ones, it makes no difference! But be sure you let me know you are finished before the time expires.

'Are you ready to begin?'
